typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code as string,
		continent as string,
		population as integer,
		indicator as string,
		weekly_count as integer,
		year_week as string,
		rate_14_day as double,
		cumulative_count as integer,
		source as string,
		note as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'raw',
	folderPath: 'ecdc/cases_deaths',
	fileName: 'cases_deaths.csv',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true) ~> CasesAndDeatshSource
CasesAndDeatshSource filter(country == "India" || country == "United Kingdom") ~> FIlterForIndiaOnly
FIlterForIndiaOnly select(mapColumn(
		country,
		country_code,
		continent,
		population,
		indicator,
		weekly_count,
		rate_14_day,
		cumulative_count
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOnlyRequiredFields
SelectOnlyRequiredFields sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'json',
	fileSystem: 'processed',
	partitionFileNames:['cases_deaths_processed.json'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> CasesAndDeathSink
